Metadata.name: Paulownia Mall QOL Pack
Metadata.author: Tupelov, Tekka
Metadata.description:
Combines two QOL scripts for Paulownia Mall:
All Arcade Machines Always: Makes every arcade game available at Game Panic at all times, regardless of date. Choose "Check the front" to boost social stats or "Check the back" to boost Persona stats.
Shop Everywhere at Night: Allows you to shop at the police station and Be Blue V at night.
